title: (x) Looking for an alternative for Agency FB - various {gang}
content:
Does anyone know of other fonts very similar to Agency FB?

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [agency.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043612/http:/typophile.com/files/agency.jpg) | 33.23 KB |
author: ayleen

comments.content:
What about Bureau Agency - available from Font Shop?

[http://www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufac...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043612/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FB.10304.0.0 "http://www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FB.10304.0.0")
I believe that's the font for which he wants an alternative.

[Refrigerator](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043612/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/refrigerator/) by [Mark Simonson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043612/http:/www.typophile.com/user/1043/track) is always a good alternative to Agency.

- Lex
